definition: Fever or pyrexia - elevated body temperature above normal range
Digestive fire weakness leading to poor digestion and metabolism
Cough - reflex action to clear airways of irritants and mucus
Skin diseases including various dermatological conditions
Mental disorders including psychosis and behavioral disturbances
treatment_approach: Mental health therapies and nervine tonics

definition: Headache - pain in the head or neck region
Diarrhea - frequent loose or liquid bowel movements
Respiratory disorders including asthma and breathing difficulties
Obesity and metabolic disorders related to fat tissue
Diabetes and urinary disorders including excessive urination
treatment_approach: Blood sugar management and urinary support
